Title: Seven Psychopaths
Overview: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.
Tagline: They Won't Take Any Shih Tzu.
Keywords: suicide, alcohol, sex, screenwriter, underworld, fight, kidnapping, party, murder, scam, los angeles, gangster, explosion, criminal, shih tzu, struggling
production_companies: Blueprint Pictures, CBS Films, British Film Institute (BFI), Film4
Cast: Colin Farrell, Sam Rockwell, Woody Harrelson
